trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_000_000<tab>Oh, greetings, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>! We're in the midst of preparing a new initiative for our friends of the Firmament. We ask for your patience meanwhile.
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_010_000<tab>If you're interested in kupo nuts, I'm afraid I cannot assist. But if you're interested in the Kupo of Fortune, you've come to the right place, kupo!

TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_010_010<tab>A-Ahem. Please disregard my outfit. I was in the midst of preparing a new initiative for our friends of the Firmament, but it appears I took too long, for Enie then conceived of...this.
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_010_020<tab>If you are interested in kupo nuts, I'm afraid I cannot assist. But if you're interested in the Kupo of Fortune, you've come to the right place, kupo!
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_010_030<tab>If it please you, I shall explain how the game works.
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_010_040<tab>Upon each Kupo of Fortune card, there are four hexagons, each depicting a treasure chest provided courtesy of our moogle friends.
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_010_050<tab>Playing is simple: you scratch open a chest of your choice.
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_010_060<tab>If the chest holds something from first to fourth prize, congratulations! The fabulous item shown on the prize list is yours!

TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_010_070<tab>But be fairly warned: a ferocious beast lies in wait for hapless treasure hunters. Should you find a griffin instead, you must console yourself with a consolation prize.

TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_010_080<tab>Now, for some important details. The chest on the left holds only second, third, and fourth prizes. Meaning, while you cannot win first prize, neither is there the danger of finding a griffin.

TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_010_090<tab>The three chests on the right, meanwhile, can hold any of the four prizes as well as a griffin. Meaning, while you have a chance to reap the richest reward, you may also walk away with a paltry prize. Which side you scratch open is entirely your choice.
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_010_100<tab>As the prizes on offer change each time you play, be sure to cast an eye over the prize list before trying your luck.
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_010_110<tab>That concludes the explanation. If you wish to review the rules, I will post the information to the skybuilders' board, so please refer to it at your leisure.
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_010_120<tab>Oh, and are you aware of our new venture for procuring materials? If not, I urge you to seek out Flotpassant for details.
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_010_130<tab>Oh, and may I ask if you've been informed about exchanging skybuilders' scrips? If not, I urge you to seek out Enie for the details.

TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_020_000<tab>If you're interested in kupo nuts, I'm afraid I cannot assist. But if you're interested in the Kupo of Fortune, you've come to the right place, kupo! Will you be trying your luck today, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>?
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_030_000<tab>Oh dear, it appears you don't have a kupo voucher. I suggest you speak with Potkin to see what items you can donate to earn the stamps required.
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_040_000<tab>Oh dear, it seems you have no room in your bag for a prize. But rest assured the Kupo of Fortune will still be here after you've sorted your possessions.
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_MENU_TITLE<tab>A kupo voucher is required (<var 20 E802 /var> remaining). Do you wish to play?
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_050_000<tab><var 60 0203 /var>Oho, you've won first prize! Congratulations, kupopo!

TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_050_010<tab>You've won <var 09 E802 ((first)) ((second)) ((third)) ((fourth)) ((fifth)) ((sixth)) ((seventh)) ((eigth)) ((ninth)) ((tenth)) /var> prize! Congratulations, kupo!
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_050_020<tab>Oh dear, it's a griffin... My pom-pom aches for you... But keep your chin up, for there is always another chance to win, kupo!
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_060_000<tab>It appears you have more vouchers. Do you wish to play again?
TEXT_CTSHWDLOT_00637_LIZBETH_070_000<tab>Whenever you wish to play again, you will find me here!
